sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./Books.css"; const Books = () => { const [search, setSearch] = useState(""); const [sortOrder, setSortOrder] = useState("asc"); const books = [ // --- Information Technology & Programming --- { title: "Clean Code", author: "Robert C. Martin", category: "Information Technology" }, { title: "The Pragmatic Programmer", author: "Andrew Hunt & David Thomas", category: "Information Technology" }, { title: "Introduction to Algorithms", author: "Thomas H. Cormen", category: "Computer Science" }, { title: "The Mythical Man-Month", author: "Frederick P. Brooks Jr.", category: "Software Engineering" }, { title: "Design Patterns", author: "Erich Gamma et al.", category: "Software Engineering" }, { title: "Artificial Intelligence: A Modern Approach", author: "Stuart Russell & Peter Norvig", category: "Artificial Intelligence" }, { title: "Deep Learning", author: "Ian Goodfellow", category: "Artificial Intelligence" }, { title: "Python Crash Course", author: "Eric Matthes", category: "Programming" }, { title: "JavaScript: The Good Parts", author: "Douglas Crockford", category: "Programming" }, { title: "Learning React", author: "Alex Banks & Eve Porcello", category: "Web Development" }, { title: "HTML and CSS: Design and Build Websites", author: "Jon Duckett", category: "Web Development" }, { title: "You Don’t Know JS", author: "Kyle Simpson", category: "Programming" }, { title: "Head First Java", author: "Kathy Sierra & Bert Bates", category: "Programming" }, { title: "Eloquent JavaScript", author: "Marijn Haverbeke", category: "Programming" }, { title: "C Programming Language", author: "Brian Kernighan & Dennis Ritchie", category: "Programming" }, { title: "Computer Networks", author: "Andrew S. Tanenbaum", category: "Networking" }, { title: "Operating System Concepts", author: "Abraham Silberschatz", category: "Operating Systems" }, { title: "CompTIA Network+ Guide", author: "Mike Meyers", category: "Networking" }, { title: "The Linux Command Line", author: "William E. Shotts Jr.", category: "Operating Systems" }, { title: "Database System Concepts", author: "Henry F. Korth", category: "Database Systems" }, { title: "Modern Database Management", author: "Jeffrey A. Hoffer", category: "Database Systems" }, { title: "Agile Software Development", author: "Robert C. Martin", category: "Software Engineering" }, { title: "The DevOps Handbook", author: "Gene Kim et al.", category: "DevOps" }, { title: "Cloud Computing: Concepts and Technology", author: "Thomas Erl", category: "Cloud Computing" }, { title: "Cybersecurity and Cyberwar", author: "P.W. Singer", category: "Cybersecurity" }, { title: "Hacking: The Art of Exploitation", author: "Jon Erickson", category: "Cybersecurity" }, { title: "Ethical Hacking", author: "Kevin Beaver", category: "Cybersecurity" }, { title: "Data Structures and Algorithms in Java", author: "Michael T. Goodrich", category: "Computer Science" }, { title: "Machine Learning for Dummies", author: "John Mueller", category: "Artificial Intelligence" }, { title: "Neural Networks and Deep Learning", author: "Michael Nielsen", category: "Artificial Intelligence" }, { title: "Programming Pearls", author: "Jon Bentley", category: "Programming" }, { title: "Code Complete", author: "Steve McConnell", category: "Software Engineering" }, { title: "Refactoring", author: "Martin Fowler", category: "Software Engineering" }, // --- Business & Economics --- { title: "Rich Dad Poor Dad", author: "Robert Kiyosaki", category: "Finance" }, { title: "Think and Grow Rich", author: "Napoleon Hill", category: "Business" }, { title: "The Lean Startup", author: "Eric Ries", category: "Entrepreneurship" }, { title: "The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People", author: "Stephen Covey", category: "Leadership" }, { title: "The Intelligent Investor", author: "Benjamin Graham", category: "Finance" }, { title: "Principles", author: "Ray Dalio", category: "Business" }, { title: "Blue Ocean Strategy", author: "W. Chan Kim", category: "Marketing" }, { title: "The Innovator’s Dilemma", author: "Clayton M. Christensen", category: "Business" }, { title: "Zero to One", author: "Peter Thiel", category: "Entrepreneurship" }, { title: "The Psychology of Money", author: "Morgan Housel", category: "Finance" }, { title: "Start with Why", author: "Simon Sinek", category: "Leadership" }, { title: "Good to Great", author: "Jim Collins", category: "Leadership" }, { title: "Atomic Habits", author: "James Clear", category: "Self-Improvement" }, { title: "How to Win Friends and Influence People", author: "Dale Carnegie", category: "Self-Improvement" }, { title: "The 4-Hour Workweek", author: "Tim Ferriss", category: "Entrepreneurship" }, { title: "Outliers", author: "Malcolm Gladwell", category: "Psychology" }, { title: "The Tipping Point", author: "Malcolm Gladwell", category: "Psychology" }, // --- Science & Engineering --- { title: "A Brief History of Time", author: "Stephen Hawking", category: "Science" }, { title: "The Selfish Gene", author: "Richard Dawkins", category: "Biology" }, { title: "The Origin of Species", author: "Charles Darwin", category: "Biology" }, { title: "The Elegant Universe", author: "Brian Greene", category: "Physics" }, { title: "Cosmos", author: "Carl Sagan", category: "Astronomy" }, { title: "Silent Spring", author: "Rachel Carson", category: "Environmental Science" }, { title: "Astrophysics for People in a Hurry", author: "Neil deGrasse Tyson", category: "Astronomy" }, { title: "The Feynman Lectures on Physics", author: "Richard Feynman", category: "Physics" }, { title: "Engineering Mechanics", author: "J.L. Meriam", category: "Engineering" }, { title: "Fundamentals of Thermodynamics", author: "Richard Sonntag", category: "Engineering" }, { title: "Electrical Engineering Fundamentals", author: "Vincent Del Toro", category: "Engineering" }, { title: "Digital Logic Design", author: "M. Morris Mano", category: "Electronics" }, { title: "Signals and Systems", author: "Alan Oppenheim", category: "Electronics" }, // --- Literature & Arts --- { title: "The Great Gatsby", author: "F. Scott Fitzgerald", category: "Literature" }, { title: "Pride and Prejudice", author: "Jane Austen", category: "Literature" }, { title: "To Kill a Mockingbird", author: "Harper Lee", category: "Literature" }, { title: "Moby-Dick", author: "Herman Melville", category: "Classic Literature" }, { title: "Crime and Punishment", author: "Fyodor Dostoevsky", category: "Classic Literature" }, { title: "War and Peace", author: "Leo Tolstoy", category: "Classic Literature" }, { title: "The Catcher in the Rye", author: "J.D. Salinger", category: "Literature" }, { title: "Don Quixote", author: "Miguel de Cervantes", category: "Classic Literature" }, { title: "The Odyssey", author: "Homer", category: "Epic" }, { title: "Hamlet", author: "William Shakespeare", category: "Drama" }, { title: "Macbeth", author: "William Shakespeare", category: "Drama" }, { title: "Frankenstein", author: "Mary Shelley", category: "Gothic Fiction" }, { title: "Dracula", author: "Bram Stoker", category: "Gothic Fiction" }, { title: "The Alchemist", author: "Paulo Coelho", category: "Philosophy" }, { title: "Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind", author: "Yuval Noah Harari", category: "History" }, { title: "Meditations", author: "Marcus Aurelius", category: "Philosophy" }, { title: "The Republic", author: "Plato", category: "Philosophy" }, { title: "Man’s Search for Meaning", author: "Viktor Frankl", category: "Psychology" }, { title: "Inferno", author: "Dante Alighieri", category: "Poetry" }, { title: "The Divine Comedy", author: "Dante Alighieri", category: "Poetry" }, { title: "Leaves of Grass", author: "Walt Whitman", category: "Poetry" }, ]; const filteredAndSortedBooks = [...books] .filter( (book) => book.title.toLowerCase().includes(search.toLowerCase()) || book.author.toLowerCase().includes(search.toLowerCase()) || book.category.toLowerCase().includes(search.toLowerCase()) ) .sort((a, b) => { const comparison = a.title.localeCompare(b.title); return sortOrder === "asc" ? comparison : -comparison; }); return (

Library Books

setSearch(e.target.value)} />
{filteredAndSortedBooks.map((book, index) => ( ))}
Book Title Author Category
{book.title} {book.author} {book.category}
); }; export default Books;
